SEARCH
Package com.nbicocchi.exercises.oop.phonebook

Interface PhoneBook

All Known Implementing Classes:
PhoneBookArray, PhoneBookList
public interface PhoneBook
Interface representing a generic PhoneBook Implementing classes must provide methods for inserting, deleting and searching persons within the PhoneBook

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addPerson(Person person)
    Adds a person to the phone book
    boolean
    removePerson(Person person)
    Removes a person from the phone book
    Person[]
    searchByLastname(String lastname)
    Searches all persons with a specific lastname
    Person[]
    searchByNameAndLastname(String name, String lastname)
    Searches all persons with a specific name and lastname

  • Method Details

    • addPerson

      boolean addPerson(Person person)
      Adds a person to the phone book
      Parameters:
      person - The person to be added to the phone book
      Returns:
      true is the phone book has been modified

    • removePerson

      boolean removePerson(Person person)
      Removes a person from the phone book
      Parameters:
      person - The person to be removed from the phone book
      Returns:
      true is the phone book has been modified

    • searchByLastname

      Person[] searchByLastname(String lastname)
      Searches all persons with a specific lastname
      Parameters:
      lastname - The lastname to be searched
      Returns:
      An array comprising all the persons found

    • searchByNameAndLastname

      Person[] searchByNameAndLastname(String name, String lastname)
      Searches all persons with a specific name and lastname
      Parameters:
      name - The name to be searched
      lastname - The lastname to be searched
      Returns:
      An array comprising all the persons found
